body_content.explanation: by using, or in the form of, a hologram (= an image made with a laser in which the objects shown look solid, as if they are real, rather than flat) or holograms:
examples: When the actor could not appear at the televised ceremony to accept the award, the producers figured out how to teleport him holographically.
The architects created a computer-generated 3-dimensional model of the design and presented it holographically to their client.
